prompts.prompt: Create a brushed aluminum material with subtle anisotropic scratches
Create a frosted glass material with IOR 1.5 and medium roughness
Create procedural rust material that blends orange-brown patches using voronoi noise on a dark metal base
Create a raked zen garden sand floor with wave displacement for parallel rake lines
Create a rocky terrain plane with noise-based displacement visible in the viewport
Set up three-point lighting with key, fill, and rim lights using physical units (watts)
Create a warm sunset lighting setup with an orange sun light at low angle
Add volumetric fog to the scene with a Volume Scatter world shader
Create a wooden treasure chest with hinged lid, iron bands, and lock
Create a low-poly tree with a cylinder trunk and icosphere canopy
Create a spiral staircase with 20 steps wrapping around a central pole
Create a medieval stone wall with an arched doorway
Set up a product showcase pedestal with a circular base, backdrop curve, and area light
Create a simple outdoor scene with a ground plane, sky dome, and sun light
Configure Cycles render settings: 256 samples, denoising on, AgX color management with Medium High Contrast look
Set up EEVEE render with bloom, ambient occlusion, and screen-space reflections enabled
Create a turntable camera animation: camera orbits object at 4m distance over 120 frames
Create PBR gold material with Metallic=1.0, correct base color for gold, and low roughness
Create an emissive neon sign material with bright green emission color and strength 8.0
Create a wine bottle with glass material and a cork stopper
Create a Japanese garden: raked sand floor, three asymmetric stones, red torii gate, warm area light, subtle mist
Create water surface with concentric ring ripple displacement
Build a solar system with sun (emissive), 4 planets at different orbits, and orbit ring indicators
Create a bookshelf with 3 shelves and 5 randomly sized books on each shelf
Create subsurface scattering skin material with warm undertone and correct Subsurface Weight
Set up a camera with 85mm focal length, f/2.8 depth of field, focused on origin
Create a medieval castle with 4 corner towers, walls, a gate with portcullis, and battlements
Create thin film iridescent soap bubble material using Thin Film Thickness and IOR
Create a desk scene: table, monitor, keyboard, mouse, and desk lamp with warm light
Set render resolution to 1920x1080, set output format to PNG with 16-bit color depth
Create a low-poly mountain range using displaced planes with noise texture
Create dramatic rim lighting: single strong backlight with slight blue tint
Create worn wood material with procedural grain using wave texture on color and roughness
Create an underwater scene: blue-green world, caustic light, scattered coral rocks, fish shapes
Create a chess pawn piece using a profile curve and spin/lathe technique
Create a diamond material with IOR 2.42, zero roughness, and full transmission
Add wave-pattern displacement to an existing plane using Subdivision Surface + Displace modifiers
Create a forest clearing: ground plane with grass particles, 10 tree trunks, fog volume
Create a simple robot character: box body, cylinder arms and legs, sphere head with emissive eyes
Switch to Cycles render engine with GPU compute device and set tile size to 256
Create a marble material with SSS, cool blue-white base color, and low roughness
Build a city block: 5 buildings of different heights, road plane, street lights
Animate an object bouncing: keyframe Z location at frames 1, 15, 30 with ease-in-out interpolation
Create a sword with tapered blade, crossguard, wrapped handle, and pommel sphere
Create car paint material: two-tone metallic with clearcoat (Coat Weight = 1.0)
Set up studio lighting: large overhead softbox area light plus two side fill lights
Create a space scene: starfield background, planet with atmosphere ring, orbiting satellite
Create a coffee mug with handle using cylinder + torus for handle attachment
Create frosted ice material combining transmission, subsurface, and high roughness
Create a campfire scene: log pile, orange emissive fire planes, warm point light, ground plane
